text: A support agent found an easier way - under the theme settings in your account: Settings > Website > Themes. In this case, the grey background colour can be removed under the _Primary colour_ settings <https://app.HubSpot.com/theme-editor/8674032/edit/cms-quotes-theme%20copy?fromAppName=settings&redirectUrl=%2Fsettings%2F8674032%2Fwebsite%2Fthemes&templatePath=cms-quotes-theme%20copy%2Ftemplates%2Fminimal.html|here>. I've attached a GIF to clarify on the changes that you can publish here.

<@U021H3TV338> It looks like youre specifying `solutions.module` as the path to the file but you can leave out the `.module` That is likely what is killing your code so the path would be `"../module/Solutions"`
